title: Carbon Dioxide Emissions Rebounded Sharply After Pandemic Dip
content:
1. Carbon Dioxide Emissions Rebounded Sharply After Pandemic Dip  The New York Times
  2. Stanford study shows carbon emissions nearing pre-pandemic levels as economy rebounds  ABC7 News Bay Area
  3. Global carbon budget shows emissions have spiked almost back to pre-pandemic levels  The Washington Post
  4. Carbon Levels Are Rising Again After Brief Covid Drop  Bloomberg
  5. Satellites Could Help Track if Nations Keep Their Carbon Pledges  The New York Times
